# spx-text-path

## Properties

| Property               | Attribute                | Description                       | Type     | Default                    |
| ---------------------- | ------------------------ | --------------------------------- | -------- | -------------------------- |
| `text`                 | `text`                   | Text to be shown.                 | `string` | `undefined`                |
| `textColor`            | `text-color`             | Text color.                       | `string` | `undefined`                |
| `textRotate`           | `text-rotate`            | Text rotation amount.             | `number` | `undefined`                |
| `textRotationDuration` | `text-rotation-duration` | Text rotation animation duration. | `number` | `undefined`                |
| `textSize`             | `text-size`              | Text size.                        | `string` | `'clamp(16px, 3vw, 24px)'` |
